name: Modules.Map.Polygon
summary: Represents a bounded area on the map.

properties.name: fillColor
properties.summary: Color to use when shading the polygon, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: holes
properties.summary: Array of points arrays that define holes in the polygon.

properties.name: points
properties.summary: Array of map points making up the polygon. Can also be an array of longitude (index 0), latitude (index 1) touples.

properties.name: strokeColor
properties.summary: Color to use for the border of the polygon, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.

properties.name: strokeWidth
properties.summary: Line width in pixels to use when drawing the polygon.

properties.name: touchEnabled
properties.summary: Determines whether view should receive touch events.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.summary: The order (depth) in which to display the polygons.
properties.description: For iOS, the polygons are drawn in the order in which they are added.
